# Government Tender Announcement: Transcription Services

## Notice of Proposed Procurement

The Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) invites interested suppliers to provide transcription services of recorded investigations. This procurement is for a period of two years with the option to extend for up to five one-year periods.

### Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) 504.13.

### Requirement Description

The CRA requires transcription services of recorded investigations, including audio and video taped conversations and interviews, into a written format. Services will be provided on an “as, when and if requested” basis through the CRA's e-procurement tool Synergy.

### Bid Solicitation and Evaluation

Proposals must comply with the requirements of the bid solicitation and meet all mandatory evaluation criteria. The responsive bid with the highest combined rating of technical merit and price will be recommended for award of a contract.

### subcontracting Pre-requisites

Contractors and partners will not be eligible to bid on this project, _unless the contract has no Canadian requirements of the project, the contract is unrestricted and no partnership is required and requires no Associations_. 

### Submittal Instructions

Bids must be submitted electronically using the Connect service provided by Canada Post Corporation. Questions must be directed in writing to the contracting authority via email.

### Security Requirements

There are security requirements associated with this procurement. Suppliers must ensure compliance with all applicable security requirements.

### Important Dates

* Tender Closing Date: February 22, 2023 at 14:00:00
* Amendment Date: February 17, 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: TBA
* Expected Contract End Date: TBA
